tables.name: compound
tables.schema_sql: id INT, metabolite_atlas_id INT, formula STRING, fragments STRING, compound_name STRING, synonyms STRING, masscharge DOUBLE, neutralmass DOUBLE, retention DOUBLE, protocol STRING, pubchem_id INT, inchi_key STRING, smiles_string STRING

tables.name: environment
tables.schema_sql: id INT, env_name STRING, temperature INT, pH DOUBLE, light_condition STRING, latitude DOUBLE, longitude DOUBLE, method STRING, inorganic_comp STRING, organic_comp STRING, env_tags STRING

tables.name: organism
tables.schema_sql: id INT, NCBI_taxid INT, common_name STRING

tables.name: project
tables.schema_sql: id INT, contributor STRING, project_description STRING, project_name STRING

tables.name: observation
tables.schema_sql: id INT, time_entered STRING, time_updated STRING, entered_by STRING, confidence INT, organism_id INT, action STRING, compound_id INT, environment_id INT, project_id INT, doi STRING
